description: Here you take the first steps in your fearless Yogic path of practice and learning: Strong Dynamic Asana Practice, Yoga History and Philosophy, Anatomy & Kinesiology Studies, building a Meditation practice, and the fundamentals of teaching Yoga and Yoga Class Sequencing are the main subjects of study. Vivi Letsou, with great experience and compassion, guides you in this process, inviting you to develop your knowledge and garner strengths you did not know you had. As a group, the Abhaya Course student teams grow together and learn so much that personalities and lives get truly transformed. We learn to help each other to grow and excel, both individually and as a team. Together we create our paradigm for a stronger, healthier, more luminous world through the practice and teaching of Yoga.
name: 200 Hour Abhaya Yoga Teacher In Training with Vivi Letsou-Foundation: Theory & Practice
